name: HellsGate
description: When drafting this time traveling, I was inspired by antagonist in some movies i've watched over my break. I love how calm and chill their attitude can be even when their destroying someone's live. I brought that attitude with my characters to resemble certain adventure movies.   The only disappointing thing was the main character inability to talk to others. I wanted to do something dark, something that I'm really not used to. I wanted to change my style for once so that's why I chose to send my character to hell. I'm proud of the fact that I actually created a game. It might not be the most visually appealing but that takes practice. Not many of my friends can say they made a game before.
